42.eng-name: The Book of Hunting and Slaughtering

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin Mughaffal that the Prophet said:"Whoever keeps a dog, except a dog for hunting, herding livestock or farming, one Qurat will be deducted from his reward each day

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي إِمْسَاكِ الْكَلْبِ لِلْحَرْثِ
chapter.eng-name: The Concession for Keeping A Dog for Farming
